title: NY New Commercial Financial Disclosure Law Requirements - The National Law Review
content: NY New Commercial Financial Disclosure Law Requirements  The National Law Review
description: On December 23, 2020, then Governor Andrew Cuomo signed into law NY CLS Fin Serv &sect;&sect; 801-812 (the &ldquo;Disclosure Law&rdquo;) with the intended purpose of &ldquo;requiring certain providers
